name: Ryudamon
description: Ryudamon takes the Shogi theme of its line to its logical conclusion, actually becoming the dragon that is the literal name of the Promoted Rook ( 竜王 , Ryū-ou ? , lit. "Dragon King") chess piece. It wears Japanese-style armor emphasize its Japanese nature, and it has the old-style Interface on its brow that marked its association with the X-Antibody storyline at its debut, similar to Dorumon .
